title: N300 Mayo's Cut Plug Duffy SGC

posts.post_title: N300 Mayo's Cut Plug Duffy SGC
posts.post_content: For sale. Hugh Duffy HOF SGC A. Someone has colored in the upper left corner and possibly lower left side hence the authentic grade. Look great otherwise.  Rock bottom price $600. shipped. Paypal f/f or checks accepted. Thanks for looking. Dave
